--canEditAndReceiveNotifications--: Can edit all details of the measure and will receive notifications on updates.
--canEditAndNoNotifications--: Can edit all details of the measure. No notifications will be sent.
--canMilestoneOwnerAndEditAccess--: Can also be milestone owner and have edit access to milestones.
--addMemberMessage--: Use <1>{{Add}}</1> to add member to internal team
--removingUser--: You are removing the <1>{{role}}</1> from the list. Please confirm to proceed.
--memberToDeputyOwner--: By assigning <1>{{DeputyOwner}}<1> role, individual can edit details of the measure but wonâ€™t receive email notifications on updates.
--memberToOwner--: This action will replace the existing <1>{{Owner}}</1> and assign them as <3>{{Member}}</3>, directing all measure notifications to the new owner
--deputyOwnerToMember--: This action will replace the <1>{{DeputyOwner}}</1> and assign them as <3>{{Member}}</3>
--ownerSelection--: Measure needs to have an Owner. Please reassign Ownership to another person
--coOwnerDescription--: Can edit/ resubmit request. Will be notified on failed or denied request
--watcherToCoOwner--: By assigning <1>{{coOwner}}</1> role, individual can edit the request and receive notifications on request updates
--coOwnerToWatcher--: This action will replace the <1>{{coOwner}}</1> and assign them as <3>{{Watcher}}</3>
--pleaseUploadFileSizeLess--: Please upload file size less than 1MB.
--noSupplierContactsAdded--: There are no supplier contacts added yet
--addOneWithContactButton--: You can add one with + Add Contacts button
